twoSetSkill.name: Wheel of Destiny 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description:
Illuminates a black star and a white star.
Black Star shines: Basic attacks have a 20% chance to gain 1,000% ATK of Physical DMG to non-Boss enemies; CD: 5s.
White Star shines: combo attacks gain 30% Crit Rate.

threeSetSkill.name: Twin Stars 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When deployed, every time the two stars switch, character gains 12% Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 3 times. Stacks are cleared once the character exits the battle.
